search.overview: 拥有财富、名声、势力，拥有整个世界的海贼王 – 哥尔·D·罗杰，他在临刑前的一句话，让人们趋之若鹜奔向大海。“想要我的财宝吗？想要的话可以全部给你，去找吧！我把所有财宝都放在那里。”于是所有男子汉航向伟大的航路追逐梦想，世界开始迎接“大海贼时代”。
search.name: 海贼王

title: アサティール2 未来の昔ばなし

search.overview: 这是发生在没那么遥远的未来的故事。住在未来利雅德的玛哈，与弟弟莱恩、苏丹是感情很好的三姊弟，他们每天都过得很快乐。然而虽然身处划时代的未来，姊弟们依然会遇上困难。当他们遇上这种事实，总是会依赖他们的奶奶。奶奶总是边述说阿拉伯半岛的古老故事，一边引导他们找到方法。
search.name: 阿萨里尔未来的民间故事

search.overview: 在动画中，继电视广告之后，令人难忘的短语和滑稽的舞蹈仍然记忆犹新，IkueOtani 将成为“购物熊猫”的代言人！请继续关注广播！
search.name: 购物熊猫！

title: 劇場版 風都探偵 仮面ライダースカルの肖像

search.overview: 《假面骑士》系列是由石森章太郎原作、东映株式会社制作的日本特摄系列英雄故事。
search.name: 假面骑士

title: 劇場版 進撃の巨人 完結編 THE LAST ATTACK

search.original_title: 劇場版「進撃の巨人」完結編 THE LAST ATTACK
search.overview: 人类为了躲避巨人威胁而建筑高耸巨大城墙，躲在城墙中过着苟且偷生的日子。一天，超大型巨人来袭打破了历经百年的和平日常，纷乱中失去母亲的少年艾伦·耶格尔自此发誓要驱逐所有巨人，成为与巨人战斗的调查军团的一员。在几番赌命的险恶战斗中，艾伦得到化身为巨人的能力，一边为人类的胜利做出贡献，逐步慢慢接近世界的真相。  时光流逝，来到墙外世界的艾伦选择与调查军团的伙伴们分道扬镳，执行一个惊世骇俗的恐怖计划：率领无数巨人将这个世界上所有能称之为生命的生命尽数蹂躏的“地鸣”。以三笠和阿尔敏为首的幸存者们，为了阻止意图毁灭世界的艾伦，挺身挑战最后的战役。
search.title: 进击的巨人：完结篇 最后的进击

search.overview: 本动画剧集以游戏《英雄联盟》为背景，讲述了在充满蒸汽朋克气息的乌托邦——皮尔特沃夫和由化学品驱动的地下城——祖安中，蔚和金克丝姐妹俩，在一场由神秘的海克斯科技引发的激烈冲突中站在了彼此的对立面，她们从此分道扬镳，朝着不同的命运终点走去，但心中的羁绊又无时不刻地让二人想要破镜重圆，而心怀正义的姐姐蔚也拼尽全力，誓要战胜地下城中的一切邪恶。
search.name: 英雄联盟：双城之战

title: マーダーミステリー・オブ・ザ・デッド

search.original_name: マーダーミステリー・オブ・ザ・デッド
search.overview: In the year 20XX, civilization has collapsed under a rampant zombie virus. A man in a white coat appears in a survivor community and announces, "We've discovered an antibody that will prevent zombification! He is found murdered. Attacks by "zombie believers" are on the rise all over the place. Rumors of a mysterious crazed strangler. Survivors disappear one after another, and a strange singing voice can be heard from underground every night.
search.name: 谋杀之谜：亡者的秘密

title: まぁるい彼女と残念な彼氏 続編

search.original_name: まぁるい彼女と残念な彼氏
search.overview: Mariko, a nurse who has loved eating and has always been plus-sized since childhood, thought she would never find love. However, one day she meets a handsome man at a group blind date that she was invited to by her senior colleague. What will Mariko, a woman with zero dating experience, do as she finds herself suddenly popular?
search.name: 棉花糖女孩遇上闷骚男孩
东京暗递
search.overview: 100 年后在人工智能当道的东京，一名孤儿少女黑客融入人群，平常并不显眼，但某天一个对她相当照顾的朋友无意间将她拉进一个为人善良却不容于社会的重机骑士帮，因为一桩与贩毒集团的命案调查，掀开了这座城市金玉其外，败絮其中的丑陋假象。

title: ヤマトよ永遠に REBEL3199 第二章 赤日の出撃

search.title: Be Forever Yamato: Rebel 3199: Part 2: The Assault of the Burning Sun
search.original_title: ヤマトよ永遠に REBEL3199 第二章 赤日の出撃
search.overview: Second part of the theatrical version of Be Forever Yamato: Rebel 3199.

title: 銀魂オンシアター2D 金魂篇

search.title: Gintama on Theater 2D: Kintama Arc
search.original_title: 銀魂オンシアター2D 金魂篇
search.overview: A compilation film of the Kintama Arc, episodes 1–4 in the third season, featuring additional footage. The movie is a part of the "Gintama 20th Anniversary Project."

title: 劇場総集編 幻日のヨハネ -SUNSHINE in the MIRROR-

search.original_title: 幻日のヨハネ -SUNSHINE in the MIRROR- 劇場総集編
search.overview: As a spirited young girl, Yohane ventured into the big city with ambitious dreams of becoming a star. Two years later, she has yet to pass a single audition. Since Yohane cannot support herself alone, her mother invites her back home to discover something new that only she can do. With limited options and an empty wallet, Yohane reluctantly returns to Numazu, her hometown.  In the seaside town, Yohane reunites with her canine companion, Lailaps, and slowly settles in, opening a fortune-telling shop. She reconnects with old friends she had forgotten and meets new ones, all of whom help in her search for a unique purpose and meaningful path in life.  Unfortunately, all is not well for Yohane and the people of Numazu: a mysterious power is affecting the town and disrupting nature and wildlife. While forging stronger bonds with her newfound allies, Yohane devotes her summer to finding the magic that may help save Numazu.
search.title: 剧场总集篇 幻日夜羽 -镜中晖光-

title: PUI PUI モルカー ザ・ムービー MOLMAX

search.title: Pui Pui Molcar the Movie: MOLMAX
search.original_title: PUI PUI モルカー ザ・ムービー MOLMAX
search.overview: The story begins with the emergence of the first high-tech molcar in Molcity, with drivers beginning to ride state-of-the-art AI-driven Molcars. Potato and friends get involved in a chase between a mysterious organization and a Molcar AI named Cannon, and are saved by a talented driver. Potato finds out that the driver is in search of his missing Molcar, and gets the idea to use Cannon's AI functionality to help with the search.
